content.detailedDescription:
I left work at approximately 7:05 pm heading for home. i was traveling west on us-95 at a speed of approx. 65 mph. i've taken this route weekly for 8 years and know it very well. heading towards lewiston, id (which is about a 15 minute drive from lapwai, the town i work in), i noticed 3 red lights in the sky, located above the clearwater river near where the mill is. the sky was clear and the moon was full so there was no question what i was looking at - 3 bright red lights. they appeared to be in perfect alignment, widely spaced apart, way high up there which i thought was pretty amazing for "three jets to be able to maintain such a perfectly straight line". that was my first thought because what else could those lights be?

as i kept driving, i kept my eye on the lights due to the fact that they were just too odd. they seemed to be really high up in the sky yet they were bright a clear. no blinking strobes, no green lights either. then it struck me that they appeared to not be moving. i was driving and moving but those lights seemed to hover. which meant that there was no way the lights were 3 jets. nor were they 3 helicopters. that made me think they could be drones hovering. still, the lights maintained their positions and even three drones would have some variations in alignment at some point. so i began to slow down to 45 mph, (there wasn't any traffic around me), and i kept turning my head around as far as i could behind me to continue looking at the lights which were now behind me. 

i passed the mill on my way into north lewiston, having thought about pulling over to watch the unusual lights because now i'm thinking this could be a ufo.  but then i quickly wrote that thought off telling myself it couldn't possibly be a ufo because everything around me seemed normal with light traffic, no blackouts, etc. it finally got to where i could no longer see them as i continued driving forward towards town.  a fire engine was heading east and i decided to continue driving since it takes me about another hour from where i was to get to my house. by the time i got home i honestly forgot all about it.

today, at work, i mentioned to my co-worker about the odd lights and to my surprise she had seen something herself about 30 minutes prior to my sighting but in the opposite direction. i tried finding reports for this in our area but have not had any luck which is why i decided to document it here.

i will add that i was listening to an audio book in my car while driving and didn't think of turning the volume down or opening my windows. so, there wasn't any unusual noise and there was no loss of electrical power. everything was a pretty typical drive home other than those three widely but perfectly aligned, bright, solid red lights just staying still up above in a clear bright night sky over the river and the mill.
content.summary: Noticed 3 perfectly spaced bright red lights as i drove home from work. they did not appear to move but maintained their alignment as i watched them. never noticed these lights before and they were very clear, bright and odd.

content.detailedDescription:
While attending my daughter’s soccer match at leander high school in leander, texas (30 minutes north of downtown austin) on the evening of february 23, 2016, something in the sky caught my eye around 6:15 p.M. i was sitting about mid-field on the home side of the bleachers, which face northeast toward the away team side. a former private pilot years ago and growing up in an aviation family, i have always kept an eye on the sky and have a very good visual familiarity with planes of all sizes. i knew what i was tracking was not airplane at all.

i surmise the object was a little lower than normal airliner cruising altitude, somewhere between 20,000 to 25,000 feet above ground level. it did, however, appear to be about the size of an airliner, but there were no wings. given this, i would say that the object was “cigar” shaped and rounded on both ends. it was also, in my estimate, not flying at airliner speed, approximately 500 mph. i would say that it was going only about 1/3 – 2/3 normal airline speed. it appeared to be white or metallic as an airliner appears, but again lower, slower, and with no contrail. it was tracking across the sky in a straight line traveling roughly north northeast to south southwest. i was able to watch it for two minutes or better before i lost it behind height of the bleachers.

that i know, no one else around me noticed the object. i didn’t mention it to anyone because i happened to be seated between away team parents that i don’t know.

i have seen weather balloons at high altitudes track across the sky in a very slow fashion, but they’re little what dots in the sky. some i’m confident it wasn’t one of those. 
to be honest i’ve never in all of my years of watching the skies seen anything like this – with one exception. in early april 2015, my youngest daughter and i went to an airshow at the little airport in burnet, texas, about an hour’s drive west from our home in leander. at some point as little pitts special aerobatic light plane completed a round of stunts with smoke, i notice something not quite right in the sky. i would say this object was at or above normal airliner cruising altitude, approximately the size of an airliner, and tracking slowly. this object was white/metallic like an airliner, except the shape is what i can only describe as “bowtie.” looking at google earth, i would say that this object was moving west to east as i was standing looking north down the runway.

in either case, i would definitely say neither object was a standard plane/airliner or any weather balloon that i’ve observed. they could possibly be drones or experimental aircraft. but my gut tells me that’s not the case.
content.summary: Cigar-shaped object about the size of an airliner tracking slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday, my 4th grade daughter squealed about seeing tripple 'rainbow rings' around the sun. we were walking to our car from her class after school. i looked up to see what she was so excited about and immediately pulled out my phone (android galaxy s5) to capture the anomaly in pictures. i was moving my phone around to different sides of the sun as i snapped picture after picture to try and get the biggest ring in the shot (it seemed like the rings were outside of my vision with the camera screen because they were so big and bright). the photos were all shot within a 10 second period. we were amazed by the beauty and strangeness of the sun rings but could not look for long because of the brightness. there was no humidity in the air which is the typical meaning of rings around the sun or moon. the weather was a dry, warm 80°. as soon as we got into our car we looked at the pictures and to our amazement, we had captured a strange orb with layers of color around it in a couple of the shots! as we zoomed in to the object we could plainly see several white spots on the orb that changed with each shot. the orb started almost on the sun (upper left side of sun) with the most color around it. i then zoomed in as close as possible for the next shot (where it had already moved south west of the sun in the picture). then i zoomed back out for the 3rd shot (where it had suddenly moved closer to the sun again almost at the middle west position). by the 4th shot the orb had moved up to the outer 2nd ring of the sun and no longer had colors around it (but if you enlarge the orb on your screen, you'll still see the white lights on the orb). the last picture (taken literally one second after the 4th picture) the orb had shot down to the opposite side of the sun (se) and was already starting to disappear. not sure what this was but it was exciting to capture on camera as it would be impossible to capture with the naked eye. my daughter and i were feeling blessed that we caught it...What are the odds?! later that evening at sunset, there was a strange spherical orange beam between the clouds that we observed as well. not sure if it was another anomoly, but we decided to capture it anyway. this was shot from downtown los gatos, california (silicon valley).
content.summary: Anomaly caught on camera while taking pictures of the tripple rings spotted around the sun (too close to sun to observe with naked eye). pics were taken within seconds of each other.

content.detailedDescription: Having competed on a night motor sport rally, retired, stopped to watch event. a small congregation were present waiting fellow competitors. unaware to me others were watching the same skyward event i was. four star light objects, not twinkling which suggests in our atmosphere, were in alignment where no stars would normally be located in the night sky. these remained motionless for what seemed ages. the rally cars had been expected but nothing came. i am not suggesting that time stood still but, it was odd. all four lights were evenly spaced out in a line. the one to the far right started to move very slowly. its path, passed each of the other three lights in turn and settled a similar distance away from the original light on the left side (hope that makes sense). in turn, they all started to do the same, however, being joined by more lights. these lights moved faster and faster across each other until they suddenly all flew off in different directions at a speed no earth craft can achieve. although witnessed by many, one lady scared locking herself in her car, no-one to my knowledge has ever spoken about this event since. another incident happened a number of years later and i will report this separately.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 lights one moved in a trajectory crossing others. others started doing the same then flew off in different directions quickly!

content.detailedDescription: I was awakened by my dog staring out the window. i saw a very bright object with pulsating red lights coming over my house gaining elevation; coming from the direction of the san francisco peaks. i watched as the object moved very fast over to the treeline then beyond stop and abruptly change direction and move so fast it was immediately out of sight. did not feel any fear actually quite calm knew immediately what it was. the object emitted no sound that i could hear.
content.summary: Dog woe up and looked out window; i work saw bright sphere with blinking lights over side of house gaining elevation @ treeline abruptly very quickly changed  direction

content.detailedDescription: Just a few min.Before 7 pm. driving vehicle.Noticed two lights,larger than any lights ever in my sky going home.Lights fixed and not moving at all.Two lights side by side in south sky.No noise.As i travel towards them they have disappeared.Lights were bright but not glowing.Two lights appeared about 1,000 ft. in air above.My friend told me next day that she saw three lights before i even told her my sighting. i have never seen anything before like this above my house direction of sky.The only thing out besides these two lights was one star.It had just turned dark and the star was very tiny but one i always see.These two lights had never been there ever.There was no sound and nothing else was in the sky during,before or after.Very quiet.When i first noticed the lights i knew that it was something large.Planes do fly over at night but never near that size! i was stunned to see these lights and they did not belong in the sky.We have an airport with in a mile air time and no mention next day of anything.I am use to planes and they never look like these huge lights.I lost sight of the lights driving up road to get closer look.The lights were finally no where.My friend mentions that she saw her sighting only a couple miles from me on the extended turn of the hwy 95 going north.The times we shared were only minutes apart between 8 and 10 min.Time shared on each of our sightings.
content.summary: Two large lights side by side/close but spaced and hovering/not moving

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were walking to my house to work on go-carts.  we lived in a neighborhood called, stewart heights in chattanooga, tennessee.  as he and i walked up the hill on social circle and the intersection of lockwood drive we could view the airport off in the distance on this very clear evening.  what we throught was a small aircraft coming in our direction as we stood on to of the hill on the roadway, a beam of light could be viewed by both of us and it continued in our direction when the light pivioted down as if focused on the ground.  both of us realized there was no noise and i should note, that was not the typical path for aircraft taking off or landing.  my friend took off runnning as we saw it pass by us overhead about 500 feet,heading west and then made a very sharp left hand turn over lookout mountain.  my friend ran home, i ran home screaming as i entered the house to my folks.  i guess they thought i lost my mind.  the next day we had to take our dog to the vet and the receptionist stated just how clear the night was and that there were several reports of a ufo over lookout mountain that evening.  my dad looked down at me and just had this big grin on his face.
there was no one to report things like this to to my knowledge back in the mid to late 60's and of course, friends of ours laughed at us.  to this day i am reluctant to talk about the event, but i know in my heart it is true and did happen to me and my friend.  that friend of mine moved later to north carolina and i know he probably remembers it just like i do to this day.
i wished that someone would take a look at the area i described herein as you can now do on the internet so you can see firt handedly what we saw then and the travel the craft made back then.
standing on that roadway the airport is east, passing overhead it traveled west and then made the hard left turn.
content.summary: Object was first seen coming from the direction of the airport.  as it got closer a bright light appeared looking straight ahead of the craft in the direcdtion of travel.  then the light pivioted downward and took off so fast towards lookout mountain.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside of my house and saw it.
content.summary: Weird and bright

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving city bus and witnessed a ufo. i was coming inbound on route 2, i was driving up 800 east towards the usu campus and noticed 4 lights over the south end of the valley. they were orange in color and distinct because of the way they were shaped and spaced together. they seemed to be hovering. they did not fluctuate or move in any direction. they were steady.  i know they were not lanterns or drones. it just seemed out of place. what made me notice them is that i always look in the sky for objects. i have reported 2 on here over the years. first one was in midland, texas and then in park city, utah. i know what i have seen. we are def not alone.

the object left my field of vision as i got into a more populated/tree lined area of the city. 

the picture attached is not one that i took, but it is exactly what i saw. shape and color.
content.summary: Driving city bus, coming inbound to transit center, noticed lights in the sky that are not normal for area.

content.detailedDescription: While taking a few photos in mid-afternoon sitting on the front porch of our home in bradford county pa. my oldest daughter viewed what appeared to be an "orb" like structure in several of the pictures. since she was facing southwest i thought the orb might have been a abnormality in the lens of her digital camera. the object appeared in two of the photos but not in subsequent photos of the same area. i hesitated at first to report this event but eventually thought it might be of interest to someone.
content.summary: Observed while taking photo's

content.detailedDescription:
The event took place around 5/5:15 am, i recall it being at least a half hour before our alarm would ring at 5:45am. i went to use the restroom, washed my hands, and as usual, because it's my tendency, looked up through my clear window at the dark sky. it was a thoroughly clear, starry night, on the early morning of 2/16/16 from my location.

what we saw in short: 3 star-like objects moving in the sky, at a very far off distance, who seemingly met, then parted ways. please refer to my pdf attachment with my detailed drawings of our sighting.

i would like to first say my restroom window looks almost directly north with where my house is located. as the 1st object is headed down in my view, i am inclined to say it was heading sw, however, i do believe that looking up at the sky from my window that views north, indicates i must actually say it was headed nw, (ie, the 3rd object was first headed up while looking out my window, so i should say it was moving se). please correct me if i'm wrong!

page 1. i drew my view from my bathroom window, on the second floor, and the clear night view i had. nothing looked out of the order, several stars were in view at this time. if you refer to all my pages as a collective, i did not redraw the tree and roof lines, however, if you were to line each page under each other you'll see i traced each one from the original page to indicate where the stars positions were in reference/approximate distance from each other and that of the moving objects.

page 2. shows the 1st star-like object moving downward from the right side of my window. i steadied my gaze, and started looking at the other stars and the rooves of my neighbor's houses. within seconds i can tell this one object is heading nw, approximately within 5-7 seconds i can see it slowly moving, as i calmly called in my partner (he too awoke before the alarm like myself).

page 3. shows my having noticed the 2nd object, slightly lower and to the left of the 1st in my view, heading ne. it wasn't hard to notice the 3rd object after, lower than the other two, heading se. it seemed they were all heading towards each other. we both noted how the other stars remained in their position. approximately 10-12 seconds elapse while we watch. 

page 4. shows specifically how close they got to each other, before the 2nd and 3rd object changed their flight direction (s/slightly se and nw respectively). approximately 3-5 seconds elapse.
[please note: in pages 3 and 4 i accidentally drew the flight paths with a "beginning" dot, i do not mean to indicate they we're leaving any type of trail nor a trailing same sized orb of any kind - just my mistake.]

page 5. i should have indicated the 1st object never seemed to slow its speed while they headed towards each other. when the other two objects did change their direction, the 1st object continued its direction nw following along with the 3rd object. we watched the 2nd object continue s, very slightly se, while approximately 7-9 seconds elapsed.

page 6. eventually we lost sight of the 1st and 3rd objects beyond the tree lines, so approximately 3-5 seconds elapse while in view. we continued to look on the 2nd object heading s until it past up out of our view at the top of the window; i mean to say in my drawing on this page that an additional 4-6 seconds elapsed while watching the 2nd object after losing visual on the 1st and 3rd.

page 7. we continue to watch the 2nd object for almost 20 seconds more.

we were calm during this event, if anything a bit happy having been witnesses to vessels flying in our night sky (obviously very far away). we took it as a cool event, and got on with the rest of our day as normal. this was by far from my first witness event, and at least my partner's second.
content.summary: 3 star-like objects total, on 2-16-16. 1st noticed heading nw, 2nd noticed heading ne, 3rd heading se to "meet." 3rd switched to nw with 1st continuing nw, while 2nd switched to s.

content.detailedDescription: Second of sighting of the night, completely different look about it. moved from n-nw in a matter of seconds like a fireball craft across the sky as it had a comet look about it but was within our atmosphere and very low and visible to the human eye, was very bright orange/yellow and dimmed to nothing instantly after
content.summary: Fireball swoosh in sky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: No star like object at first trip outside for cigerette, then went outside again roughly 6.15/20pm and seen a bright white star gleaming. i noticed it was ufo moving towards my directoon (wednesbury) then it slowly cloaked as if it knew it had been seen. the light then dimmed/cloaked, could still see object acting invisible in dark sky amongst a very light night sky mist (other stars visible) then lost sigh due to the darkness.
content.summary: Hovered in my central vision dudley direction,moved,then cloaked

content.detailedDescription: I seen it for about 5 minutes, it was very light colour, there is a plane under it, `
content.summary: Not sure what it is

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the street in our living area and was just watching straight ahead. first i thought it could be one of these sky lanternes, but it was to far away and to big and the light was amazingly gaudy.
the red pulsating object appeared from nowhere in an altitude max. 600ft
big like football. it moved very slowly and was pulsating. for my eyes it was a very gaudy red pulsating light. it moved from east to ne and hovered in the direction of the runway. the runway is about 10 km from my viewpoint in the ne. no airplanes at that time. at 20:39:36 (6 seconds after it appeared 20:39:30) i took first picture and a seconded. picture. at 20:39:39 i took a video for about 9 seconds and after 5 seconds of recording it vanished.The first picture it is to much blurred. but the second is not so much blurred. i was really amazed about it but in fact it was not my first sighting. when i saw the uap i was stoped walking, graped my smartphone a samsung galaxy s5. i loose the sight because it vansihed.
content.summary: Red pulsating object appeared east from nowhere in the dark moved very slowly and hovered in front of runway about 3 miles
content.locationName: Tambon Bang Pla, Chang Wat Samut Prakan

content.detailedDescription: Went to new mexico last year and as we were going by this red clay dirt, i took a couple of pictures outside the window. a few days ago i noticed this in one picture. i did not notice it at the time. i look for this stuff as i've witness ufos before. i have pics and videos on some of those too through out my life.
content.summary: Object in picture

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house watching football nfl insider. my brother calls me and tells me to look outside. i went outside my residents at bremerton washington 98377, seen two bright lights....Hovering for awhile while flashing extremely brighter than normal compared to prayer ballons, air craft, helicopters, b 29 bombers.....Nothing like them....They hovered for about 4 minutes, one went se like it was going towards seattle washington...Then stopped flashed more. then flew back by its buddy. they both start shifting around up,down,left,right..One leaves to patrol...Another one appears. then another one appears....They all are hovering in the same area. but some are super bright and some others are just hovering dimmer than the others. but there flashing differently.....Like if they were to pulse. it would be something of this sort. (blinking) .B,b,b,b,b,b,b,b, really bright blink x2 .B,b,b,b,b,b,b, really bright blink x2. really strange....Hope u take this seriously. i know there really. there still around.....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It started with my brother calling me on my cell phone. he told me to look towards the east by mt rainer...So i stepped outside and instantly seen 2 extremely bright lights. flashing different patterns compared to airplanes or any other such air craft. jb

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of the landscape. when i got home and was editing the photos, i noticed this object in one picture, but not in the next one taken 2 seconds later. the object want in any other picture. when i noticed it, i zoomed in and noticed that it's a sphere with what look like lights evenly spaced around the outside. the first photo i have attached is before any editing.  the second has the sphere circled.  photos were taken with my samsung s5.
content.summary: Grey sphere with white lights evenly spaced around the outside

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking some pictures of  a beautiful sunset with the boston city on the background. i was near constitution beach exactly on bayswater st. in east boston, ma.
i took 14 pictures total of the sunset on saturday, february 20 2016 at 5:10 pm.  when i got back home i showed the pictures to my wife and we notice a little object on one picture that caught are attention, at the beginning i thought that was dust on the camera lens of my cellphone but went i did zoom in on the picture to see close up we look our faces each other, we said... what!!! that looks like a flying saucer, we couldn't believe it. so we saw the next picture and that object was right there again but in a different place, we checked the rest of the pictures to see if we can find it in another pictures too. so the object it's on the first 4 pictures out of 14. looks like the object is moving from the center of the photo it's on top of the sun also you can observe a halo on it (first picture) on the second the object is on the right hand side of the picture and the next 2 photos the object is on the left hand side of the photos.  that happened probably in a lapse of time of 2 or 3 seconds between each picture. so checking the info on the photos all 4 were taken at 5:10 pm that day, so all that happened in the same minute.
content.summary: Looks like a flying saucer

content.detailedDescription:
Witness, 5 years old, got up to get a glass of water. returned to his room to find a "wavy blue vortex" from which a voice asked "do you want to go with us?" he agreed and felt a tingling static sensation then found himself on what appeared to be a polished marble surface. a female et (she had breasts) greeted him in a soft feminine voice with "hello (name withheld) it is nice to see you again." she was about 4 feet tall with milky white skin, a small nose, no lips (he thinks), and almond shaped eyes that were not as large as a typical gray. he was led up a staircase to a hall about 12 feet wide and in to an area with 12 beds, 6 on each side of the room. one bed was empty. there were hybrid (he thinks) children with medium gray skin in the beds and several were jumping on the beds. a clearly annoyed et told them to stop jumping. 
the female et escorting him gave him a medallion like one she was wearing and told him she was going to help him increase his mental powers. she told him to concentrate on her inner self. she then passed through what appeared to be a solid concrete block.  she then instructed him to try. he was able to go only part way through and she had to pull him out. she told him to try again and the second time he was successful. she told him that he had mastered it faster than she did. she took back the medallion.
she next led him through a door that opened by sliding up. where he met a male et who was taller than the female and had "native american cheek bones." the witness states that the male was holding back his emotions. there were windows in this part of the craft and he could see out into space. there were also controls of some type in this room. he could see through a window in the floor into an area with a machine which he believes was the teleportation device. the craft was a disk and the size of "4 aircraft carries end-to-end."
an old et entered and said it was time to leave. everyone became sad. he woke up in his bed neatly tucked in. no one had ever tucked him in before.
when he was 8 years old, he saw the same type of craft and said that when it ascended, it was gone in the blink of an eye. he estimated the speed at '60,000 miles an hour." he stated that they have craft the size of small planets and the one that was recorded drawing plasma off our sun is one of them. the video is on youtube. 
on one occasion, he was shown a vision in which he saw 4 disk shaped craft and hangars as if on a military base. there was a crowd of people who all appeared to be in a trance state walking into a craft. he pretended to be in a trance also and boarded with them. in side there was a bench on the wall and happy gray children sitting on it swinging their feet. several old ets approached him and asked him, "do you want to come with us or stay here?" he said he wanted to go with them and they were surprised. the vision ended.
when he was 16 he had a vision of being taken to a beautiful planet where it was very bright but it did not hurt his eyes. he felt a powerful sense of peace. the houses appeared to be of adobe. there was one building that was made of bricks that looked something like a college. it had a tower reminiscent of big ben. he was told that this is where they receive knowledge and store things from other planets.
on another occasion, he remembers military doctors operating on his head. a reptilian male told them to stop because the boy was in pain.
the witness is 23 years old. he has celtic and native american (iroquois) ancestry. after his experience at age 5, he felt "different." he has short term memory problems and states that he often feels that he is different ages, mostly older than his years. he has had chronic nose bleeds and his right nostril is difficult to breath through. he has a cousin who has had some experiences that were not gone into.
content.summary: 1997 witness 5 years old abducted taken aboard craft escorted by female et 4 feet tall milky white skin

content.detailedDescription: I volunteer with the local humane society and was on my way to care for the animals when i spotted a bright object in the sky. i watched it and noted that is was reflecting light and appeared to be stationary. no stars were observed at this time. i took a picture to show my family because i was thinking it could be a satellite. my car continued to function as usual. i did not have any sort of distress. the object stayed stationary till i arrived at my destination. when i got out of the car and looked up it was gone. no one was with me and i did not discuss this with anyone. my family said it would be a good idea to let mufon see the pictures. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Driving east in early morning. saw stationary object above and in front of me. took picture.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a smoke around 10:45 pm july 14 th 2014. right away two lights high up in the night sky came into view. the two lights were flying side by side at like satellight hieght. they were going in nw direction and went to the darkest spot in sky and just totally blinked out from my sight just like that. then another light came out from over our roof and went right to the exact same spot over our house and disappeared in the same spot. i saw a person on the news about five years ago who had a video of what i saw. i truely believe i did not see satellights. they do not come right over you and all three just disappear like this. i watch the skies closley and have seen thousands of satellights in the night sky. this is one strange event i saw.
content.summary: 2 lights came from the east and disappeared in on spot then another came into view and went to the same spot and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq with witness on phone by fi l. flechtner on 02/23/2015.
____________________

july 1974, 3 witnesses abducted onto saucer shaped craft with rainbow lights. three teenage witnesses were playing basketball from 6 to 9 am saturday morning. weather was clear and sunny and they were across the street from a fire station in fairview, nj. while walking back to his friends home noticed that the area was empty of cars and people when normally there would be "50 to 100 people in the park." noticed rainbow colors out of the corner of his right eye rainbow colors. when he looked he saw a shining silver metallic saucer with round tinted windows. he alerted his two friends who also saw the craft. he heard and felt whirring/roaring and his shirt was flapping as if in "a 50 mile an hour wind" but there was no wind. they were paralyzed and could not run. they arrived back at his friend's home with no memory of walking there. witness discussed the incident with two friends (both now deceased) and they had no memory of being on the ship as he did. he recalls seeing them on "operating tables" but he was standing approximately 30 feet away. ship appeared larger inside than outside, possibly 400 feet across. about 25 creatures, approximately 4 feet tall were present with about 10 to 15 around him and the rest around his friends. the creatures were gray in color with large round heads and large black eyes. the creatures were touching him all over. they were speaking telepathically and were surprised when they realized that he could hear them. his mother had told him that there was psychic ability in their family but he had never really believed it. he asked why they were there. his impression was that they were friendly and curious and meant no harm. he believed that they were trying to help his two friends who both had heart problems and he believes that their lives may have been extended by the aid rendered on the craft. he remembers looking out the window and down onto the basketball court where they had been playing. he could see other beings moving about in long corridors. he remembers seeing the craft ascend after they had been returned. it moved up and to the right, then left, then up and away leaving a rainbow colored trail behind. when he returned to his home his mother said he seemed changed and he replied "it's no big deal mom." before this report he had only confided this story to his two daughters because he did no believe that anyone would believe him.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: July 1974, 3 witnesses abducted onto saucer shaped craft with rainbow lights

content.detailedDescription: These images were taken from a game camera. we cannot explain what the lights are.
content.summary: Caught on game camera

content.detailedDescription: Nobody had atention in that object. my cousin took the pic and send to me. i want you analize it to see what was the that object
content.summary: The object was tiny and was far, was like a light going in one direccion without sound

content.detailedDescription:
On my way to work at sallisaw,oklahoma hospital where i worked as a nurse had to drive from stigler, oklahoma to sallisaw.  just outside of sallisaw i had to drive to top of wildhorse mountain.  as i got to the top of the mountain, i noticed a light in the sky to my left and thought to myself it was an airplane coming in for a landing (as sallisaw has a small airport).  the object was quite a way away.  as i started my descent about 2 seconds later down the mountain, the object suddenly was hovering over my car hood approximately several feet above it.  i thought at the time it was going to crash into me.  i saw it was a triangular shape silver (not shiney) in color and had blue and yellow lights around the triangular edge - the lights did not pulsate or move, there was absolutely no sound coming from it, no windows that i could see.  i never did stop, almost felt like time stood still.  when i looked up, it was gone.  there was no where it could have gone as left side of the road was a sheer drop-off and the right lane where i was driving, had huge trees.  i worried that it had crashed into the trees but could see no sign of it. shaken, i drove to work and another nurse said i was pale as a ghost and asked what was wrong.  i told her and encouraged me to call police, which i shouldn't have done because the police came and took a statement but were indicating i was seeing things.  i told them i didn't know what it was and perhaps it was a government experimental craft.  they laughed all the way out.
also i once observed a huge glowing (like the sun)ball gently drop into the thames river in norwich, connecticut in the summer of 1970.  there is a submarine base close by.  this was around 2 a.M. i just happened to be up and saw it from my window. it scared me and just went to bed and pulled the covers up over my head.  i never spoke of this to anyone.
content.summary: Silver triagular object with yellow and blue lights - car sized - 1-2 high

content.detailedDescription: Just sitting by the window when i happened to look out and saw a tiny little dot of light in the sky at first i thought it was a toy plane but as i continued to look i noticed that there was three dots of light darting around by the time i got my fone i only got a few seconds of the dots and only saw two of them in the video the objects then just vanished after that
content.summary: Little darting lights at cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from work on december 10, 2013  about 3am.Traveling west. i was mid block between evergreen and bushwick ave. brooklyn i was admiring the orion constellation when out the corner of my i notice a flash. something like a flashlight sweeping by. when i turned to see what it was. i saw a roundish somewhat oval matt black craft it was the same color as the sky. with blinking and pulsating lights. the craft made no noise that i could here i only heard the m train approaching or leaving the myrtle avenue station on the jmz lines. the craft was traveling what seemed to slow it turned slightly showing the complete view of the bottom. i pulled out my phone a started to record what i was looking at. then the craft jumped or shot straight up in the air very fast in a instant this is in the video i shot. from their it started to vanish or it seemed to vanish slow. this took about 2 second to vanish.
content.summary: I was was walking home from work. admiring orion. when i saw a small flash. the a mat black ship with lights crossed my path. it made no sound. it some what turned and the vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my car to go to work. it was a frosty morning and i was defrosting my car windows. i noticed the object out of the passenger window. i looked at it for a few minutes without the object moving position. i then got out my car and took a picture. a minute or two later it gradually faded until it disappeared. i felt excitement at the thought of capturing for me a solid ufo sighting.
content.summary: Saw bright sphere object, hovering stationary for 5 minutes then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On february 20th at approximately 1410 i was leaving my house to walk my dog.  approaching my house was a squadron (5) apache helicopters. i pulled out my phone to snap a picture.  the phone was a lg g4 with high end optics.  as the choppers flew over my house i set the magnification to maximum as the aircraft were flying at approximately 1500-2000 feet and i wanted some good detail.  this process took longer than i thought and i was only able to catch the two choppers that are in this picture.  i thought cool, and went about my day.  later that evening i was showing the picture to my wife when i noticed something.  in front of the lead helicopter i saw some dots.  6 of them in what i believe is a near to far flight pattern.  when i magnified these even further with my phone i was unable to see any contrails or pixilated movement trails.  i didn't see them at all in real time so this leads me to believe they were hovering at a very high altitude over the yakima training center which is the direction the helicopters were going. this military complex is a well known hot spot for ufo activity.  any conventional aircraft would certainly be leaving contrails at that altitude as contrails are everywhere in the sky above yakima.  i took 3 more pictures of the same sky in the same weather to see if my camera had dirt or a flaw however there was nothing.  i don't know if these are actual ufo's or not but i would love to see this picture washed through a computer to try to clean it up and see what they really are.
content.summary: My camera picked up these objects that were not visible to the naked eye.
